name: duplicitously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves duplicity (= dishonest talk or behaviour, especially saying different things to different people): These industries have called duplicitously for action on climate change while also making a profit at the expense of the environment. He tried to keep the information secret in a duplicitously underhand manner. Related word
duplicitous
More examplesFewer examplesGovernments should not act duplicitously, but sometimes do.He is quite willing to operate duplicitously when he needs to.They are duplicitously influencing the climate change debate for their own purposes.How should the jury know if a defendant is speaking duplicitously?
